post.body: are you mad at me? im sorry but thats just how i feel. email me if you wnt to discuss this more
imean,i get lnly 2,buti alwys kno tht ur thr for me.so i dnt feel so bad n e more.it just..idk makesme feel likeu kinda 4gotme
also you shouldnt feel depressed or lonely. im always there for you. Always.
cont. frm. last msg.) that makes me feel like, you know, like i dnt pay attntn to you. or i dont even count!
but thats at school! they are jerks. but here, i ALWAYS pay attntn to you . how do you think that makes me feel?
im sorry to hear that. and i read your answer a while ago and its so sad! what makes you feel lonely?
totally fine.
hello i seen you have joined me. how r u?
OH YEAH!!!!
im good. i bet i know why u connected to me here.
hey gee, did u know that im a graphic designer too? im in college right now.
THEN WTF IS IT? hey and how come no one replies to my msgs. only my bf does! and frank is FINALLY on twitter, damn!
HEY I LIVE IN CALIFORNIA! RIGHT NEXT TO LA! HA WE'RE PRACTICALLY NEIGHBORS!
HIIIII FRANK! you know, im like a big fan of u guys. but guess what? no one is answering me! x-ept my bf!
email me
how'd it go? what did they say? are you getting better persciptions?
HAPPY BDAY BOB! sorry i didnt know until now. again HAPPY BDAY!
hey thats my 360 page. i dont use it that often
BOOOOOOB! MY CHEM FANS DISLIKE JOBLOWS. sorry.
hey just a quick question? how come u guys dont connect with your fans? i mean im one of your fans. ive never heard from you.
i most definiely did it .i love animals and im sorry about your loss. as long as you have dixie right?
http://twitpic.com/wxeu - yeah frank, sorry love halloween too, but its over all right.
u2 frank. dude REPLY TO ME! none of your band mates do.
hey gee, do you think you guys can play at my wedding (whenever that is)?
I AM WEARING A SANTA HAT.

we all carry on. though our brothers in arms all fall. so raise your glass high cuz tomorrow i die and return through the ashes U crawl.MAMA
im damned after all. through fortune and flame i fall and if you could stay then ill show u the way to return through the ashes u crawl
